briefTitle: Intra-individual Comparison of Efficacy and Safety of Metvix® Natural Daylight Photodynamic Therapy Versus Conventional Metvix® Photodynamic Therapy in Subject With Mild Actinic Keratoses

armGroups.label: Metvix and daylight
interventionNames: Drug: Metvix and natural daylight PDT

outcomeMeasures.title: Lesion Response
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent of lesions treated at Baseline, in complete response at Week 12

outcomeMeasures.title: Pain Score
outcomeMeasures.description: Subject self assessment of pain on a scale from 0 (no pain ) to 10 (extreme pain)
